channel.title: Logins
channel.description: How do I make it say for example ii taxi ii owner of taxiscape has logged in?

item.title: Logins
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

if(playerRights < 1) { sendMessage("Welcome to the Itzscape V3 Server!"); sendMessage("You can pk in FALLY, spells do not require levels either!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod]: "+playerName+" has logged in."; } if(playerRights == 1) { sendMessage("Welcome back moderator "+playerName); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod]: "+playerName+" has logged in."; } if(playerRights == 2) { sendMessage("Welcome back administrator "+playerName); sendMessage("Ban all rule breakers no warnings"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin]: "+playerName+" has logged in."; } if(playerRights == 3) { sendMessage("Welcome back administrator "+playerName); sendMessage("Ban all rule breakers no warnings"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Super-Admin]: "+playerName+" has logged in."; }

Base it off this

find what it say when you log in in youer client.java and add playerhandler.messagetoall = “messgae here”

Read full topic
